GSD.description:
drm/amdkfd: svm range restore work deadlock when process exit

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.3 by commit 858822905f4bf44100d63c5e22e263109976f7cb. For more details please see the references link.
